channel.title: Blog on Iaroslav Domin
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Iaroslav Domin

item.title: Highcharts Spiderplot
item.description: library(readr) library(ggplot2) sumldiam <- read_csv("data/sumldiam.csv") ggplot(sumldiam, aes(x, y, group = SUBJ, color = BOR)) + theme_minimal() + geom_point(size = 1.1) + geom_line(alpha = .9, size = 1) + scale_color_manual( "BOR: ", values = c("CR" = "#00aedb", "PR" = "#00b159", "SD" = "#ffc425", "PD" = "#d11141", "NE" = "#545454"), guide = guide_legend(order = 1) ) + geom_hline(yintercept = 0, color = "gray75") + labs(y = NULL, x = "Week") + theme(panel.
